game_description: This game has been retired. It's a new type of first person shooter (FPS) game. You play as a monkey. The locomotion is inspired by gorilla tag. You can run, jump, and shot using only your hands. This game is only a demo now. It will be gradually improved. More game contents will comming soon. You can get this game for free recently!
